title: She Does Good Hair
description: A hairdresser on the fast-track to salon fame, is yanked back to her hometown when she inherits a rundown salon with three beauticians--stuck in the 80s--and certain to maker her life a tangled mess. Only God could bring together four of the most unlikely of women to be a blessing to each other--that is if they don't kill each other first!
author: Terri Gillespie
